work.title: Implementation Consultant
work.description: I implement Commercial Off-The-Shelf (COTS) and customize them to fit the needs of my company's diverse clientel, which consists of numerous Government agencies. I work as part of an agile development team utilizing VB.Net and MS SQL Server to provide creative, scalable solutions to modern business needs.
